resources.string: This app was built with awesome technologies, here is where I give praise to the libraries that make this app come to life!

When making this app I had convenience and ease of use in mind. New York City is all about convenience, from the moment you open this app I wanted the user to be met with all viable and up to the minute information about the MTA subway system.\n As a student, who also works and travels frequently throughout all five boroughs of the city, I felt there was something missing in the current offering of transit apps that cater to the city; convenience, information, and ease of use.

The service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip.\n If you are deaf or hard of hearing use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

string.name: protocol_buffers_license
string.pre:
This license applies to all parts of Protocol Buffers except the following:
- Atomicops support for generic gcc, located in src/google/protobuf/stubs/atomicops_internals_generic_gcc.h. This file is copyrighted by Red Hat Inc.
- Atomicops support for AIX/POWER, located in src/google/protobuf/stubs/atomicops_internals_aix.h. This file is copyrighted by Bloomberg Finance LP.
- Andorid.mk, which is copyrighted by The Android Open Source Project.
